components.name: Agent Wiz CLI
components.description: The command-line interface that allows users to extract workflows, visualize them, and analyze them against threat models.

components.name: Workflow Extractor
components.description: A component that uses AST-based static parsing to extract agentic workflows from source code.

components.name: Threat Assessment Engine
components.description: Evaluates extracted workflows against threat modeling frameworks like MAESTRO to identify vulnerabilities.

components.name: Visualization Module
components.description: Generates interactive visual representations of agentic workflows in HTML format.

components.name: Supported Framework Parsers
components.description: AST-based parsers for various agent orchestration frameworks to facilitate workflow extraction.

data_flows.description: User inputs commands to extract workflows from specified directories.
Extracted workflows are sent for threat analysis.
Generated threat assessment reports are returned to the CLI for user access.
Extracted workflows are sent to the visualization module for graphical representation.

trust_boundaries.name: User Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The local environment where the user operates the CLI tool.

trust_boundaries.name: Threat Assessment Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The environment where workflows are analyzed for threats.
